statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT schedule_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE schedule_date = '2023-12-25';
SELECT assignment FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE shift_start_time >= '06:00:00' AND shift_end_time <= '15:00:00';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS shifts_count FROM EmployeeSchedules GROUP BY employee_id HAVING shifts_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, shift_start_time ASC, assignment
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, assignment FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id = 101 AND shift_start_time >= '08:00:00'
SELECT DISTINCT assignment, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM EmployeeSchedules GROUP BY assignment HAVING total_shifts > 5 ORDER BY total_shifts DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND assignment LIKE '%Manager%'
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE schedule_date = CURDATE() ORDER BY shift_start_time ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM employee_schedules WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_id, task_description, deadline FROM assignments WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT assignment_id, employee_id, task_description FROM assignments WHERE employee_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY start_time ASC, end_time DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedules INNER JOIN assignments ON employee_schedules.employee_id = assignments.employee_id WHERE deadline >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC, schedule_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(assignment_id) AS num_assignments FROM assignments GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_assignments > 5 ORDER BY num_assignments DESC;

SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM assignments WHERE deadline >= '2022-06-01') ORDER BY employee_id ASC, schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM employee_schedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_type FROM assignment WHERE assignment_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM assignment WHERE assignment_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) as employees_count FROM department JOIN employee_schedule ON department.department_id = employee_schedule.employee_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT assignment.assignment_id, assignment.assignment_type, employee_schedule.schedule_date FROM assignment JOIN employee_schedule ON assignment.employee_id = employee_schedule.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_date='2023-01-15';
SELECT shift_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM shifts WHERE shift_start_time < '08:00:00';
SELECT schedule_name, start_date, end_date FROM schedules WHERE total_shifts_assigned >= 10 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM shifts WHERE shift_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.employee_name, s.shift_date, s.shift_start_time FROM employees e JOIN assignments a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id JOIN shifts s ON a.shift_id = s.shift_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT project_name, status FROM assignments ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE id = 10
SELECT project_name FROM assignments WHERE status = 'In Progress'
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY end_date
